response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high quality and functionality, I think it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true value, I propose a price of $140 for you to acquire this exceptional item. I'm confident this price reflects not only the cost but also the immense value it will bring to you. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and needs.", "product_price": 140}
